template.description: The master for pages with less content, that can be displayed centered. It provides the container-fluid layout for full screen content. In case you want a layout for for more information to be displayed use master.xhtml.
template.name: Portal Master Centered

templates.template:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:f="http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/core" xmlns:h="http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/html" xmlns:ui="http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/facelets" xmlns:cui="https://cuioss.de/jsf/core"> xmlns:boot="https://cuioss.de/jsf/bootstrap">
<ui:composition template="/templates/master_centered.xhtml">
<ui:define name="title">#{msgs['portal.title']}</ui:define>
<ui:define name="content"> ${cursor} </ui:define> </ui:composition> </html>
